description:
Lum`s former lover Rei comes crashing into town in the hopes of winning her back, but ends up breaking hearts left and right!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Henshin Bidan Rei ga Kita! / Kutabare Iro-Otoko!
Le fiancé / Meurs, tombeur de filles
Rei, il mostro della città - Guai per un dongiovanni
The Coming of Rei, the Handsome Shapechanger / Die Ladykiller!
変身美男 レイが来た! - くたばれイロ男!
